item.title: Oiligarchy
item.description: Ever heard about the Rockafeller petro fortune of half a trillion dollars? From a small backyard drilling operation in Texas to a global corporation of evil and greed. In this game youÂ´ll have to explore and drill some of the richest zones in the planet in a matter of crude oil, corrupt the politicians and with them, control the world. For a never ending stream of profits, Oiligarchy is the way to go.
